translation: The second is divided into four sections according to the sequence of the meditations (first meditation)
two kinds of formlessness
two organs of emancipation
characteristics of the three bodies
four lifetimes
two summaries of the three activities (from above)
three periods of sensation as retribution (natural retribution)
Four Assemblies of the Realm of Supernormal Power (Ranshō)
two conclusions (four)
First, the correct explanation of the text (Explanation)
Second General Collection of Karma (formerly referred to as)
three bases of nescience (hence the Ying)
four kinds of knowledge are eliminated without break (still ten)

source_sentence: 大方廣圓覺經大疏鈔科中
translation: Dafangguang yuanjue jing dashi chao kezhong
